name: mental-ts

scripts.debug: npm run lua && npm run build && cd mental && ./Sonic\ Modules --debug --skip-logo
scripts.release: npm run lua && npm run build && cd mental && ./Sonic\ Modules --skip-logo
scripts.start: npm run build && cd mental && ./Sonic\ Modules --debug --skip-logo

author: DeanCode
description: A project for writing your game in TypeScript and run the generated lua code inside the mental engine
